name: fifty three
description:
said something funny but you didn't hear me
almost said it again more clearly but it's over - Don't Fade Away, Beach Fossils

A friend that's one day younger, a friend you talk to very rarely. A friend that you know forever, a friend you always feel. A friend that you see as constant, a friend that sees you.

A meeting that changed something.

TW: implied toxic/abusive relationships, (brief) mentions of internalized transphobia & mental health issues Music is by Stevia Sphere ("chlorophyll", "mint (acoustic demo)"). Made with Muji gel ink ballpoint pen, shitty dollar-store sketchbook paper, and canon scanner.

TUMBLR
